mapper.select: SELECT p.order_code AS orderCode, i.order_state AS orderState, i.QUANTITY AS quantity, pk.STATE AS packageState, pr.ITEM AS productName, s.BRANDNAME AS brandName, pr.THUMBNAIL as thumbnail, TO_CHAR(p.order_date, 'YYYYMMDD') AS orderDate, i.quantity AS quantity, i.price AS netPay FROM product_order p JOIN order_item i ON p.order_code = i.order_code JOIN product pr ON i.productcode = pr.productcode JOIN SELLER_BRAND s ON pr.BRAND_CODE = s.BRAND_CODE JOIN PACKAGE pk ON pk.ITEM_CODE = i.ITEM_CODE WHERE p.memberidx = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY p.order_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCTREVIEW (REVIEW_NUM, MEMBERIDX, PRODUCTCODE, CONTENT, BLOCK, STARRATE) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCTREVIEW.nextval, #{memberIdx}, #{productCode}, #{content}, #{block}, #{starRate})
